00036 inline void CCrcCalculator::UpdateCrc(const I_BYTE& byte, I_DWORD& crcValue)
00037 {
00038        crcValue = (crcValue >> 8) ^ s_crcTable[byte ^ (crcValue & 0x000000FF)];
00039 }
